original_title: Crusty Demons of Dirt 12: The Dirty Dozen
overview: They Are Back! Jumping dirt bikes over fire, buildings, and any thing In their way. You Name it, they've Done It! Take a journey with Crusty Demons throughout Australia, New Zealand, and Tasmania. See the secret riding spots in America & exotic India. Crusty Demons: Dirty Dozen Is filled with the best riders In the world making the most impossible possible!
title: Crusty Demons of Dirt 12: The Dirty Dozen
